General.Name: Hangzhou Weiguang Electronic Co Ltd
General.Description: Hangzhou Weiguang Electronic Co.,Ltd. researches, develops, manufactures, and sells motors, fans, micro-motors, drives and controllers, robots and automation equipment, pumps, and new energy auto parts in China. The company offers refrigerator, ECM, and servo motors, as well as external rotor fans and automotive air conditioning units. Its motors are used in textile machinery, industrial automation, robotics, and other fields; and micro-motors are used in automobiles, household appliances, and military industries. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
General.Address: Yuhang Economic Development Zone, Hangzhou, China, 311100
